verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: illegal] [V: caught] [ARGM-LOC: at airport] [ARGM-MNR: using facial biometrics border security officials] have caught a second impostor trying to enter the united states using a new facial comparison biometric system it is the second time in less than three weeks since the ghana dulles washington international airport washington dulles washington united states cbp congo us customs and border protection officer new york biometrics d c
